column2: On most days do you have pain, aching, or stiffness in either of your feet? (note: does not include ankle)
Is the pain, aching, or stiffness in your right foot, left foot, or both feet?
Is the pain aching or stiffness mild, moderate, or severe in your [Right/left] foot? (probe: if you had to choose one word, which one would it be?) 3a) Right foot
Is the pain aching or stiffness mild, moderate, or severe in your [Right/left] foot? (probe: if you had to choose one word, which one would it be?) 3b) Left foot
